Sentencas: An adaptive generalized predictive control (GPC) system is presented for the management of output power of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Generalized predictive control for fractional order dynamic model of solid oxide fuel cell output power

Sentencas: The dynamics of SOFC output power are characterized by a fractional order model, which is more accurate than an integer order model to depict the dynamics; the fractional order dynamic model is taken as the controlled plant of the GPC system.
Titulo: Generalized predictive control for fractional order dynamic model of solid oxide fuel cell output power

Sentencas: The GPC algorithm adopts a linear approximation method that uses a linear predictive model to approximate locally and dynamically the nonlinear dynamics of SOFC output power at each sampling period.
Titulo: Generalized predictive control for fractional order dynamic model of solid oxide fuel cell output power

Sentencas: Moreover, the parameters of the predictive model are identified online to overcome the time-varying dynamics of SOFC output power via introducing a forgetting factor recursive least squares (FFRLS) algorithm.
Titulo: Generalized predictive control for fractional order dynamic model of solid oxide fuel cell output power

Sentencas: Finally, according to the future power outputs predicted by the predictive model, an optimal current control sequence is obtained by solving a multistage cost function.
Titulo: Generalized predictive control for fractional order dynamic model of solid oxide fuel cell output power

Sentencas: The results demonstrate that the dynamic responses of the GPC system are quick and smooth, and the change of the current control sequence is slow and smooth.
Titulo: Generalized predictive control for fractional order dynamic model of solid oxide fuel cell output power

Sentencas: The quick and smooth dynamics are important for satisfying the rapid load following of SOFC generating systems and for prolonging the lifetime of SOFC stack.
Titulo: Generalized predictive control for fractional order dynamic model of solid oxide fuel cell output power
